price: 34. Waxay leeyihiin waxay doonaan Rabbigood agtiisa; kaasi waa abaalgudka sama falayaasha.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna ʿinda rabbihim dhālika jazāu al-muḥ'sinīna
